1370: Amalburga moved to Die lange straet2.A.2 after marriage.
Got married to Hardenbernus at age 16 in 1370.
Gave birth to Gertrudis in 1370 at age 16.
1371: Gave birth to Menzone in 1371 at age 17.
1372: Gave birth to Wilmarus in 1372 at age 18.
1375: Gave birth to Ghodelde in 1375 at age 21.
1376: Lost son Wilmarus when Wilmarus was 5 years old.
1377: Gave birth to Godefridus in 1377 at age 23.
1379: Lost son Willem when Willem was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Willem in 1379 at age 25.
